text: tavada numbage paramadhipati adamge daruvangen ovunge koduvalin ovunge parapura gena ovunata erehi va ovunma saksi dærimata pat kota numbalage paramadhipati ma nove dæyi (ohu vimasuveya.) eseya api saksi daramu yæyi ovuhu pævasuvoya. (ese pratignavak ganu læbuve) malavun keren nægituvanu labana dinaye ‘niyata vasayenma api me gæna anavadhanin lesa sitiyemu yæyi numbala nopavasanu pinisaya
